title: The Thirteenth Chair
description: A TV version of the Bayard Viellet play about a s√©ance held to trap a murderer among the attendees.

title: Casino Royale
description: American spy James Bond must outsmart card wiz and crime boss LeChiffre while monitoring his actions.

title: Epitaph for a Spy
description: An unsuspecting Iron Curtain refugee is used as a pawn by two French traitors while he is at a resort in France.

title: The Leaf Out of the Book
The Champion
description: A ruthless professional boxer, Midge Kelly (Rory Calhoun), tramples anyone he can to get to the top, including his loyal brother Connie (Tommy Cook). This is a TV version (adapted by Rod Serling) of the Ring Lardner story, filmed in 1949 as Champion, with Kirk Douglass as Midge, Arthur Kennedy as Connie.

title: Private Worlds
description: TV version of the ahead-of-its-time film

title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
description: A little known adaptation of Robert Louis Stevensons' classic

title: Fear Strikes Out
description: A young major league baseball player, Jimmy Piersall (Tab Hunter), battles mental illness and a harsh upbringing to succeed as a Boston Red Sox outfielder. Based on the memoir of the same title by Piersall. Made into a movie in 1957 starring Anthony Perkins as Piersall.

title: Adventures of Huckleberry Finn
description: Huck and Tom discover buried treasure, while trying to keep it secret from Huck's father.

title: The Day They Gave Babies Away
The Lou Gehrig Story
description: Long-time New York Yankee star, first baseman Lou Gehrig battles ALS with the help of his wife, and of his teammate, catcher Bill Dickey. The disease cuts short Gehrig's great baseball career, and kills "The Iron Horse" within a few years.

title: The Man Who Lost His Head
Child of the Wind/Throw Away the Cane
Strange Sanctuary
description: A man with a shadowy past encounters a burglar who attempts to blackmail him.

title: The Man Who Stole the Bible
Trial by Fire
description: A forest fire spreads with fury, threatens a town with destruction, and brands a boy a murderer.

title: The Secret of the Red Room
Jacob and the Angel
description: A criminal lawyer makes a desperate gamble to defend a boy charged with murder. Risking his career, his love, even his health, he faces an even greater terror when he finds his own guilty conscience is on trial.

title: A Matter of Life and Death
Four Hours in White
description: Trapped in a crossfire of human emotions, a hospital chief surgeon fights his own conscience to decide the fate of two men. He must weigh the possible sacrifice of one life for another.

title: The Secret Love of Johnny Spain
Albert Anastasia - His Life and Death
The Thief with the Big Blue Eyes
The Great World and Timothy Colt
